data.eml:eml: A taxonomic revision of genus Labrundinia Fittkau, 1962 (Diptera: Chironomidae: Tanypodinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Silva, Fabio Laurindo Da, Fonseca-Gessner, Alaide Aparecida, Ekrem, Torbjørn (2014): A taxonomic revision of genus Labrundinia Fittkau, 1962 (Diptera: Chironomidae: Tanypodinae). Zootaxa 3769 (1): 1-185, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3769.1.1
